name: Super Mega Ball (Early Beta)
description:
super-mega-ball.com SUPER MEGA BALL

Super Mega Ball is a fast paced arcade football game in which you master dashing, mega tricks & super shots to show your friends and the world who's the best!

The final video game will contain several unique stadiums and teams to choose. It includes a local multiplayer for couch sessions up to 4 players. An online multiplayer mode for up to 2 players locally against others and a single player campaign is also planned  ( but not included in beta test ).

EARLY  BETA  TEST

We are very proud and excited to give you access to our free beta test.
We hope you can enjoy the game in its early state and would love to hear your feedback to further develop and improve the game.

SO, ENJOY AND THANK YOU FOR TESTING!

REQUIREMENTS

- Controller(s) to play (XBox alike)
- Recent mid-range PC setup with Windows.

SORRY, PLAYING WITH KEYBOARD AND MOUSE IS NOT WORKING!

Enjoy more texts, images, videos and share also on social media:  

Twitter  Instagram  Facebook  YouTube
